blocks.name: bnj1522
blocks.content: Well-founded recursion, part 3 of 3. The proof has been taken from Chapter 4 of Don Monk's notes on Set Theory. See ~ http://euclid.colorado.edu/~~monkd/setth.pdf . (Contributed by Jonathan Ben-Naim, 3-Jun-2011.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm bnj1522(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7) {
  |- wi(w3a(w-bnj15(c0, c1), wfn(c2, c1), wral(s0, c1, wceq(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), cfv(c3, cop(cv(s0), cres(c2, c-bnj14(cv(s0), c1, c0))))))), wceq(c4, c2))
  -| wceq(c5, cab(s1, wa(wss(cv(s1), c1), wral(s0, cv(s1), wss(c-bnj14(cv(s0), c1, c0), cv(s1))))))
  -| wceq(c6, cop(cv(s0), cres(cv(s2), c-bnj14(cv(s0), c1, c0))))
  -| wceq(c7, cab(s2, wrex(s1, c5, wa(wfn(cv(s2), cv(s1)), wral(s0, cv(s1), wceq(cfv(cv(s2), cv(s0)), cfv(c3, c6)))))))
  -| wceq(c4, cuni(c7))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c6)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c3)
  -| diffsc(s2, c5)
} = {
  bnj1523(s0, s1, s2, hs0, hs1, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, c6, c7, crab(s0, c1, wne(cfv(c4, cv(s0)), cfv(c2, cv(s0)))), w3a(w-bnj15(c0, c1), wfn(c2, c1), wral(s0, c1, wceq(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), cfv(c3, cop(cv(s0), cres(c2, c-bnj14(cv(s0), c1, c0))))))), wa(w3a(w-bnj15(c0, c1), wfn(c2, c1), wral(s0, c1, wceq(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), cfv(c3, cop(cv(s0), cres(c2, c-bnj14(cv(s0), c1, c0))))))), wne(c4, c2)), w3a(wa(w3a(w-bnj15(c0, c1), wfn(c2, c1), wral(s0, c1, wceq(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), cfv(c3, cop(cv(s0), cres(c2, c-bnj14(cv(s0), c1, c0))))))), wne(c4, c2)), wcel(cv(s0), c1), wne(cfv(c4, cv(s0)), cfv(c2, cv(s0)))), w3a(w3a(wa(w3a(w-bnj15(c0, c1), wfn(c2, c1), wral(s0, c1, wceq(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), cfv(c3, cop(cv(s0), cres(c2, c-bnj14(cv(s0), c1, c0))))))), wne(c4, c2)), wcel(cv(s0), c1), wne(cfv(c4, cv(s0)), cfv(c2, cv(s0)))), wcel(cv(hs0), crab(s0, c1, wne(cfv(c4, cv(s0)), cfv(c2, cv(s0))))), wral(hs1, crab(s0, c1, wne(cfv(c4, cv(s0)), cfv(c2, cv(s0)))), wn(wbr(cv(hs1), c0, cv(hs0))))))
  biid(w3a(w-bnj15(c0, c1), wfn(c2, c1), wral(s0, c1, wceq(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), cfv(c3, cop(cv(s0), cres(c2, c-bnj14(cv(s0), c1, c0))))))))
  biid(wa(w3a(w-bnj15(c0, c1), wfn(c2, c1), wral(s0, c1, wceq(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), cfv(c3, cop(cv(s0), cres(c2, c-bnj14(cv(s0), c1, c0))))))), wne(c4, c2)))
  biid(w3a(wa(w3a(w-bnj15(c0, c1), wfn(c2, c1), wral(s0, c1, wceq(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), cfv(c3, cop(cv(s0), cres(c2, c-bnj14(cv(s0), c1, c0))))))), wne(c4, c2)), wcel(cv(s0), c1), wne(cfv(c4, cv(s0)), cfv(c2, cv(s0)))))
  eqid(crab(s0, c1, wne(cfv(c4, cv(s0)), cfv(c2, cv(s0)))))
  biid(w3a(w3a(wa(w3a(w-bnj15(c0, c1), wfn(c2, c1), wral(s0, c1, wceq(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), cfv(c3, cop(cv(s0), cres(c2, c-bnj14(cv(s0), c1, c0))))))), wne(c4, c2)), wcel(cv(s0), c1), wne(cfv(c4, cv(s0)), cfv(c2, cv(s0)))), wcel(cv(hs0), crab(s0, c1, wne(cfv(c4, cv(s0)), cfv(c2, cv(s0))))), wral(hs1, crab(s0, c1, wne(cfv(c4, cv(s0)), cfv(c2, cv(s0)))), wn(wbr(cv(hs1), c0, cv(hs0))))))
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c(crab(s0, c1, wne(cfv(c4, cv(s0)), cfv(c2, cv(s0)))))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c4)
  diff.hs1.c(crab(s0, c1, wne(cfv(c4, cv(s0)), cfv(c2, cv(s0)))))
  diff.hs0.w(w3a(wa(w3a(w-bnj15(c0, c1), wfn(c2, c1), wral(s0, c1, wceq(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), cfv(c3, cop(cv(s0), cres(c2, c-bnj14(cv(s0), c1, c0))))))), wne(c4, c2)), wcel(cv(s0), c1), wne(cfv(c4, cv(s0)), cfv(c2, cv(s0)))))
}
